fields.summary: Android: Review composite layout feature requests

comments.body: We need to evaluate the JIRA feature requests and bug reports after 2.0.1 release related to composite layout feature and see if we need to enhance the spec and implementation.

I hope that composite layout specification will finally become publicly available since every developer should know it and understand it.


I really don't understand the point in having it kept in private.
@Ivan - Composite layout specification has been available publicly for a while.  http://docs.appcelerator.com/titanium/2.0/index.html#!/guide/UI_Composite_Layout_Behavior_Spec
I wasn't aware of that link (there is also one private link), thanks.

@Neeraj - any info about vertical and horizontal layout specification? I have some issues with horizontal and vertical layout and I don't know what to expect (what is valid behavior). Having that two specs would clear things up.


Thanks.
